Medios de Pago¶

Documentación sobre los medios de pago al cliente disponibles en el sistema.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

clientes¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

Retorna True si el medio de pago es efectivo

mediopagocliente_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

monedas¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class medios_pago.models.MedioPagoCliente(*args, **kwargs)[fuente]¶

Bases: Model

Modelo intermedio que almacena la relación entre medios de pago y clientes, junto con todos los datos específicos de configuración del medio de pago para cada cliente.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

class Child(Model):

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

medios_pago.models.asociar_medios_pago_basicos_a_nuevo_cliente(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)[fuente]¶

Cuando se crea un nuevo cliente, automáticamente le asocia los medios de pago básicos usando el modelo intermedio MedioPagoCliente

medios_pago.models.asociar_medios_pago_basicos_a_todos_los_clientes(sender, **kwargs)[fuente]¶

Asocia automáticamente los medios de pago básicos (“efectivo”, “cheque”, “billetera_electronica”, “transferencia”) a todos los clientes existentes usando el modelo intermedio MedioPagoCliente

medios_pago.models.crear_medios_pago_iniciales(sender, **kwargs)[fuente]¶

Crea automáticamente los 5 medios de pago después de ejecutar las migraciones

medios_pago.models.relacionar_nueva_moneda_con_efectivo(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)[fuente]¶

Cuando se crea una nueva moneda, automáticamente la relaciona con el medio de pago “efectivo”
